Summary: Light orb like which seemed to give off smaller light orbs.
trends: There have been 67 other sightings in Louisville
There were no other sightings in Louisville on or around August 25th 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsWhile working the late shift August 24th , 11 to 7 am I took a break to go outside after finishing the bulk of my work. I was smoking while looking up to the southeast sky I saw what I was sure was Venus. IT wasnt real bright but visible. I have been fooled by Venus before so I took time to note the behavior. It seemed like a faint light moving slightly. much like venus does seem to do .. I stood for a minute to look at exactly the location and the behavior. After about 2 minutes I noticed what seemed like smaller light balls or orbs being projected from the larger light. I was certain that it was my eyes playing tricks. I stood behind a support column to see if I could line up the object to actually see if it was moving but it didnt help much. This light seemed to gain in intensity then fade. IT did this a few times but It did seem to emit smaller lights and cast them in different locations. If Venus was in the southeast sky around 2 am early this morning I feel thats what it was , If not It could be something else..? I wasnt realy going to post this but I noticed the exact same discription of something seen from Loveland Ohio on Aug 24th. It seems almost exactly like what I had seen.
